@usedefault
@@title User: ${id}

{{timestamp}}

{{user_info: guid:$$id}}
{% if id %}
h2. User: ${id}

{{actions:
- display: Edit User
  action: '#user_edit'

- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/system/usermanager/delete?username=$$id
  navigateback: true

- display: Send Reset Password Link
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/user/sendResetPasswordLink
  data:
   username: ${id}
   email: ${emails}
}}
{{user_edit: guid:$$id}}

|*Groups*|${", ".join(groups)} |
|*Emails*|${", ".join(emails)} |
|*Authkey*|${authkey} |
|*Last Checked*|{{div: class=jstimestamp|data-ts=${lastcheck}}}{{div}}|
|*Active*|${active}|

h3. Accounts
{{accounts: acl.userGroupId:${id}}}

h3. Cloud Spaces
{{cbspacesusers: userId:$$id}}

{% else %}
No user provided
{% endif %}
